text: A pacemaker was implanted due to persistent bradycardia.
The corporate office recently introduced a casual dress code for all employees.
Elevated LDL cholesterol levels were managed by increasing the dose of statins.
The city council debated new regulations for electric scooters.
An echocardiogram showed left ventricle hypertrophy, indicating thickening of the heart muscle.
An innovative biotech startup is developing gene editing therapies to tackle rare genetic diseases.
